title: SQLComments

metadata.description: Learn about SQLComments with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title:
SQL
Comments

SQL Comments
Comments are used to explain sections of SQL statements
content_sections.content:
, or to prevent execution 
of SQL statements.
Note: Comments are not supported in Microsoft Access databases!

content_sections.title: Single line comments start with
content_sections.content:
--
.
Any text between -- and the end of the line will be ignored (will not be executed).
The following example uses a single-line comment as an explanation:

content_sections.title: Example
Example
Example
content_sections.code:
-- SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Products;

content_sections.title: Example
Example
Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE (CustomerName LIKE 'L%'
OR CustomerName LIKE 'R%' /*OR CustomerName LIKE 'S%'
OR CustomerName LIKE 'T%'*/ OR CustomerName LIKE 'W%')
AND Country='USA'
ORDER BY CustomerName;
